thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Benny Can
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Benny Can

author: Benny Can
title: Benny Can
text: The first order had a defect in it. I bought a headlight for a bicycle and the wire is exposed because the screw was lose. I contacted Tomtop via email and sent a picture of the unit. They would not do anything. So I'm stuck with something that works but has an expose wire installed in a bicycle that is exposed to the elements. Not really safe to use.
